A vibrant, highly detailed 8K car traveling through a country road in a vibrant, detailed, and cinematic comic/realistic art style. The artwork features soft lighting, vibrant colors, challenging atmosphere, and a blend of octane and Unreal Engine rendering. It is an award-winning masterpiece with sharp focus and ultra-realistic details, perfect for fans of realistic and detailed comic/realistic art.
